page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The area is generally very{sparsely {populated}with the vast majority of the{land being covered by crop filled {fields or enclosed grazing areas}owned by affluent farmers.This rural picture is complemented by a number of woods and forests,predominantly to the south. Two major centres of population are{two small villages:St.Ippolyts {and Gosmore.These two villages}almost merge into one and some inhabitants are still confused as to within which village their properties lie. Immediately to the{north of Gosmore {lies a wealthy suburban area leading {into Hitchin}itself,while to the extreme south of our 4x3 kilometre block lies the northern most part of{Preston village.
